description: The AWS::SecurityHub::OrganizationConfiguration resource represents the configuration of your organization in Security Hub. Only the Security Hub administrator account can create Organization Configuration resource in each region and can opt-in to Central Configuration only in the aggregation region of FindingAggregator.

AutoEnable.description: Whether to automatically enable Security Hub in new member accounts when they join the organization.

AutoEnableStandards.description: Whether to automatically enable Security Hub default standards in new member accounts when they join the organization.

ConfigurationType.description: Indicates whether the organization uses local or central configuration.

Status.description: Describes whether central configuration could be enabled as the ConfigurationType for the organization.

StatusMessage.description: Provides an explanation if the value of Status is equal to FAILED when ConfigurationType is equal to CENTRAL.

MemberAccountLimitReached.description: Whether the maximum number of allowed member accounts are already associated with the Security Hub administrator account.

OrganizationConfigurationIdentifier.description: The identifier of the OrganizationConfiguration being created and assigned as the unique identifier.
